page.title: 05THE A4 TO AND FROM THATCHAM
page.content: This road is part of the Great West Road from London to Bristol. Today it is the main road from Newbury and Thatcham to Reading and it is greatly used by vehicles going onto the M4(Junction 12). 376 vehicles went onto the A4(Thatcham) from the roundabout. 270 had come from the Theale by-pass, 16 from Wigmore Lane, 73 from the A340, 13 from the A4(Theale) and 4 went once round the roundabout. 592 vehicles went onto the roundabout from the A4(Thatcham). 480 had come from the Theale by-pass, 13 from Wigmore Lane, 68 from the A340, 27 from the A4(Theale) and 4 had gone once round the roundabout. The major problem presented by this road is the difficulty for pedestrians going to and from Wigmore Lane.
